attributes.action: Recognition of odisim and it’s rights to practice freely and openly within UK
attributes.background:
Odinisim has been around and practiced longer than most religions current has a large following in the world we practice and teach life skills honour love of family 

We are a victimised religion who has been in the shadows and wish to practice openly and freely with all rites and practices

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "recognition". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
